title: Dick Whittington and his cat
creator_credit: Sterling Educational Films and Tad Wilkosh
brief_description: Set in the Middle Ages using puppet animation to tell the story of the boy whose affection for a stray cat leads to wealth and fame, showing that kindness and goodness prevail. Narrated by Stanley Jackson. Written by Israel M. Berman.
